scripts.example: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter='bundle-mode-example' run docs:dev
scripts.test: pnpm format && pnpm --filter='vitepress-templ-preview' test && pnpm build
scripts.web:build: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter='docs-web' run docs:build
scripts.web:dev: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter='docs-web' run docs:dev
scripts.web:preview: pnpm run web:build && pnpm --filter='docs-web' run docs:preview
